MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA11 postcode area of Rainford, St Helens affecting properties in Ormskirk Road, Tudor Close, Lords Fold and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:36AM. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties. Our engineers have found further damage to our underground cables and due to the complexity of the repairs we now expect to restore the power by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.58PM on 8th March 2021
